snippet: David Goffin defeated Marin Cilic 7-6 (4), 6-4 on Thursday to reach the semifinals of the BNP Paribas Open, the best result so far of the Belgian's career....
lead_paragraph: David Goffin defeated Marin Cilic 7-6 (4), 6-4 on Thursday to reach the semifinals of the BNP Paribas Open, the best result so far of the Belgian's career.

headline.print_headline: Goffin Beats Cilic to Reach Semifinals at Indian Wells
headline.main: Goffin Beats Cilic to Reach Semifinals at Indian Wells
